requirement.name: Additional Major - German - Third-Year or Business German
Additional Major - German - Literature and Culture

courses: Study Abroad requirement. Completion of GRM 202 or equivalent is required. See your Academic Advisor.
German electives. Additional crs in GRM courses 250 and above
to meet the requirement of at least 34 but not more than 40 crs in courses in the major.
courses at the 300 level and above.
a second year foreign language course demonstrating competency in a foreign language.
